
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19024287" title="发布于 2025-08-06 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款基于 .NET + Vue 编写的仿钉钉的开源低代码工作流引擎，支持多种数据库，开箱即用！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一款基于 .NET + Vue 编写的仿钉钉的开源低代码工作流引擎，支持多种数据库，开箱即用：AntFlow.NET。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AntFlow.NET 是一款基于 .NET + Vue + FreeSql + Natasha 编写的仿钉钉的开源（Apache-2.0）低代码工作流引擎，支持多种数据库，让工作流开发像普通 CURD 一样简单，即使没有流程开发经验的程序员也能快速开发流程，效率提升利器。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000652777-1308212031.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目特征</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>极简配置：告别繁琐设置，轻松上手，让开发变得更加简单直观。</span></li>
<li><span>学习成本低：消除复杂概念，即便是工作流新手也能迅速掌握并应用于项目。</span></li>
<li><span>功能对标钉钉/企业微信/飞书等审批流程 ，可用于多种业务场景，简单易用、可扩展性强、可定制、可SAAS化。</span></li>
<li><span>支持流程设计、条件分支、顺序会签、会签、或签、加批、委托、转办、打回修改、重新提交等高级特性，为中国式办公量身定制。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目技术栈</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>ASP.NET Core：</strong><span>&nbsp;现代化的 Web 开发框架。</span></li>
<li><strong>FreeSql：</strong><span>&nbsp;高性能、强类型的 ORM 框架。</span></li>
<li><strong>Natasha ：</strong><span>&nbsp;动态编译与运行支持，基于 Roslyn 的 C# 动态程序集构建库。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源代码</span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前端</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000711313-573397246.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>后端</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000729685-1108504009.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>演示效果</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>在线演示地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="http://antflow.top/dotnet/#/login?redirect=/index" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">http://antflow.top/dotnet/#/login?redirect=/index</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000805815-710111241.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000811208-1944334244.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000817351-1634215849.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000823365-366330978.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000830415-943382533.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000836977-291959598.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250806000843254-19393770.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>后端开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/antswarm/antflowcore" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/antswarm/antflowcore</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>前端开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/tylerzhou/Antflow/tree/master/antflow-vue" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/tylerzhou/Antflow/tree/master/antflow-vue</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞</strong><span>）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
